about_the_game:
Thank you everyone for your support! The OST for Lost in Secular Love is now available! It has 24 songs done in traditional Chinese style (including the instrumental version of the opening and ending songs); produced by an independent Chinese musician and composer @TetraCalyx. I hope that you will enjoy it.

Original sound tracks for "Lost in Secular Love" composed by TetraCalyx, contain the following pieces:
(mp3,320kbps）

01 露草行(Over The Dewy Grass)
02 尘沙惑(Lost In Secular Love)
03 青莲(Green Lotus)
04 线香(Joss-Stick)
05 琉璃(Glaze)
06 霜槭(Red Maple)
07 风和(Balmy Breeze)
08 晨景(Matin)
09 晴明(Sunny And Bright)
10 暮霭(Dusk)
11 蜂蝶(Bees And Butterflies)
12 戏怠(Idle Game)
13 安澜(Tranquility)
14 落萤(Falling Fireflies)
15 浅梦(Shallow Dream)
16 靛染(Dye-Tarnished)
17 眩华(Rotary Halo)
18 云影(Shadow Of Cloud)
19 夜岚(Rainstormy Night)
20 水逝(Elapsing)
21 无涯(Boundlessness)
22 露草行（Over the Dewy Grass Zheng Version）
23 滴水叶尖(Dripping Tip)
24 露草行(Over The Dewy Grass) - TetraCalyx Cover

About The DLC Content!
Someone has bought the DLC pack, but they can't find the content!
We are very sorry for the unclear description!

All The DLC Content will be in the local Folder
By Property -> local Folder

There would be 3 more Folders!

Lost in Secular Love - Original Soundtrack
Lost in Secular Love - FanBook
Lost in Secular Love - Opening song Characters' Version

All the content will be in it.

Thanks for your supporting for 《Lost in Secular Love》!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows xp
  • Processor: not limited
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: not limited
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Built-in Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: not limited
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: anything is ok
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Built-in Sound Card
